content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I see you’re interested in electrical work. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Emily! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area?
Great, Emily! We do serve Springfield. Could you describe the electrical issue or job you need done?
There’s a flickering light in the living room and some outlets aren’t working.
Thanks for the details. When would be an ideal time for a technician to come by and diagnose the issue?
I’m not sure yet... I need to talk with my spouse to get approval before scheduling anything.
I understand, Emily. Please take your time discussing with your spouse. If you want, I can provide you with a rough price estimate now to help with your decision.
That would be helpful, yes, please.

Based on similar jobs, the cost usually ranges between $120 and $200, depending on the specifics found during diagnosis. Let me know if you’d like me to save your info and follow up later or if you have any other questions.
Thanks. I'll have to get back to you after I talk with my spouse.
reason: customer needs spouse approval before scheduling
